name: Pixel Champion: King of Heroes
description:
「A tappy, bouncy fantasy idle game」

▶ Simple Game Mechanics
Tap away the endless spawn of evil monsters.
Defeat monsters and bosses to earn gold.
Use gold to hire loyal heroes or learn powerful skills.

▶ A Diverse Set of Heroes
Level up heroes to have them learn new skills.
Hire all sorts of heroes - Ninjas, Warlocks, Archers, the list goes on!
Promote hero classes to increase their power.

▶ Nonstop Action
Your heroes will fight for you 24/7, even when the game is off!
Collect coins even when you are offline!

▶ Prestige System
Reach a stage that you just can't beat?
Prestige to earn relic shards and unlock powerful relics!
Become even more powerful with the ability to prestige!


Play Pixel Champion: King of Heroes free now!
